mapper.select: select id, name, price, description, image, stock, delivery_type, status, create_time, update_time from t_commodity <where> <if test="name != null and name != ''"> and name like concat('%', #{name}, '%') </if> <if test="deliveryTypes != null and deliveryTypes..size() > 0"> and delivery_type @> array [ <foreach collection="deliveryTypes" item="item" separator=","> #{item} </foreach> ] </if> <if test="statuses != null deliveryTypes..size() > 0"> and status in <foreach collection="statuses" item="item" open="(" close=")" separator=","> #{item} </foreach> </if> <if test="startCreateTime != null and startCreateTime != ''"> and create_time >= #{startCreateTime} </if> <if test="endCreateTime != null and endCreateTime != ''"> and create_time <= #{endCreateTime} </if> </where> limit <if test="currentPage > 1">#{currentPage}*#{pageSize}</if> <if test="currentPage <= 1">1</if> offset #{pageSize}
